title: Review: KOM Full Motion Rocker Plate RPV2 rocks side-to-side and front-to-back
content:
KOM Cycling are setting a new benchmark in indoor cycling with the all-new Full Motion Rocker Plate RPV2. Not only does it rock from side-to-side, but it also offers 9 inches of fore-aft movement too. At $799.99, this has to be the most reasonably priced rocker plate boasting that particular set of features. We put [â€¦]

The post Review: KOM Full Motion Rocker Plate RPV2 rocks side-to-side and front-to-back appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
